article.headline: Charlotte's Web launches C$67.5 million share offering
article.body: Charlotte's Web Holdings Inc. CWEB, +11.34% CWBHF, +11.83% launched a C$67.5 million ($49.9 million) offering of shares through syndication on Tuesday, joining the many companies to issue new equity during the coronavirus pandemic. The Boulder, Colo.-based maker of CBD and hemp extract products said Cannacord will serve as lead underwriter with Cormark Securities, Eight Capital and PI Financial acting as co-managers. U.S.-listed share fell 11% and are down 38% in the year to date, while the S&P 500 SPX, +0.87% has fallen 5%.
